column1: What topics will you cover in the course?
column2: Machine learning, Deep learning, Natural language processing, Time series analysis, and Generative AI.
column3: The course covers machine learning, deep learning, natural language processing, time series analysis, and generative AI.

column1: What is the duration to complete the course?
column2: Around 6 months. When you spend 2 hours per day, you will complete the course.
column3: The duration to complete the course is around 6 months. When you spend 2 hours per day, you will complete the course.

column1: Is this course recorded or conducted as live classes?
column2: This course is pre-recorded.
column3: This course is pre-recorded.

column1: How can I clarify my doubts?
column2: We have a support team to clear doubts instantly.
column3: You can clarify your doubts by reaching out to our support team, who are available to help you instantly.

column1: Do you offer flexible payment options?
column2: Yes, we provide various payment plans.
column3: Yes, we provide various payment plans.

column1: Will you issue a certificate after completing the course?
column2: Yes, of course we provide course completion certificate.
column3: Yes, of course we provide a course completion certificate.

column1: Can we access the course from outside India?
column2: Yes, our courses are accessible from outside India.
column3: Yes, our courses are accessible from outside India.

column1: Is there any constrain to complete the course in stipulated time period?
column2: Time period is flexible. You can finish by your own customised time slot.
column3: The time period is flexible, and you can finish the course at your own customized time slot.

column1: Are there any community forums or online groups?
column2: Yes, we are active in linked in & WhatsApp channel.
column3: Yes, we are active in LinkedIn and WhatsApp channels where students can connect with each other.

column1: Are there any alumni testimonials or success stories from previous students?
column2: Yes, kindly refer our website https://www.hopelearning.net for more details.
column3: yes, kindly refer our website https://www.hopelearning.net for more details.

column1: Can I receive feedback on my assignments or projects?
column2: Yes, you will receive the assignment/project feedback from the mentor ASAP.
column3: Yes, you will receive the assignment/project feedback from the mentor asap.

column1: How is student progress assessed throughout the course?
column2: Progress is assessed with the quality of the submitted assignments.
column3: Progress is assessed with the quality of the submitted assignments.

column1: Are there any opportunities for hands-on practice or real-world projects?
column2: Yes, very often we provide hands-on practice & real-world projects via the WhatsApp channel.
column3: Yes, very often we provide hands-on practice & real-world projects via the WhatsApp channel.

column1: Do you offer any specialised tracks or concentrations within the course?
column2: Yes, all your contributions & efforts are tracked and we post doubt clarification dashboard every week.
column3: Yes, all your contributions & efforts are tracked and we post doubt clarification.

column1: Can I preview a sample of the course content before enrolling?
column2: Yes, you can by logging into our app named Hope AI or website.
column3: Yes, you can preview a sample of the course content by logging into our app named Hope AI or website.

column1: Do you offer any additional resources or support for career advancement after completing the course?
column2: Yes ,we provide lifetime accessible resources & career guidance upto 3 years from the time of course completion.
column3: We provide lifetime accessible resources & career guidance up to 3 years from the time of course completion.

column1: How often are the course materials updated to reflect the latest industry standards or research?
column2: Every 3 months once.
column3: The course materials are updated every 3 months to reflect the latest industry standards or research.

column1: Are there any interactive components such as quizzes, assignments, or group discussions?
column2: Yes, we often provide assignments & conduct webinar with few resource persons.
column3: Yes, we often provide assignments and conduct webinars with a few resource persons for interactive components in the course.

column1: Can I access course materials offline or only online?
column2: Offline access is also available.
column3: Yes, offline access is also available for the course materials.

column1: Are there any prerequisites for enrolling in the course?
column2: No such prerequisites other than basic knowledge in maths besides enthusiasm, is suffice to successfully complete the course.
column3: No such prerequisites other than basic knowledge in maths besides enthusiasm, is suffice to successfully complete the course.
